definition: to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate

sentences.english: The exquisite necklace you sent me really matches my new dress.
sentences.chinese: 你寄來的精美項鍊，非常配稱我的新衣。

sentences.english: Examine the pair for pairing and balance.
Pretty faces need to be match with healthy and shining hair.
sentences.chinese: 再美麗的容貌也需要健康的頭髮配稱。

sentences.english: Only those who pay taxes are citizens.
sentences.chinese: 只有完糧納稅的才配稱市民。
